Posts.Content: Hi Ladies, I have been taken off anastrozolle due to a reaction / sores up my legs , had bloods and biophy last week to see if it s due to anastrozolle or finishing chemo , Like you my once boob gets quite tender and tight but I do keep up with exercises , as you say we must keep on with the fight ,lots of hug to you all Jillie
Posts.Title: Letrozole/Anastrozole side effects

Posts.Content: Hi nickyslin, I'm. About the same as you finished all treatment June ,my mouth is about the same as yours ,cant eat anything sweet only savoury I've just thought it an after affect , in time it might return to normal if this is the only side affect I can take it .take carexxJillie
Posts.Title: Mouth problems

Posts.Content: Hi grape6vine I have just finished chemo@ rads, no sleeping at night and the ol heart pounding was some of my side affects , you are not alone , keep posting there are lots of us here to listen and help lol and hugs
Posts.Title: Not sleeping
